lead_paragraph: Draymond Green has always been known for his defense, but he has emerged as the N.B.A.’s most unheralded triple-double threat since Lever, whose prime was short but memorable.
snippet: Draymond Green has always been known for his defense, but he has emerged as the N.B.A.’s most unheralded triple-double threat since Lever, whose prime was short but memorable.

headline.main: A Warrior Can Join the Likes of Chamberlain, Bird and Fat Lever
headline.print_headline: A Warrior Can Join the Likes of Chamberlain, Bird and Fat Lever

abstract: Keeping Score column; Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green, like former NBA player Fat Lever, has turned himself into All-Star despite being labeled too small for sport and spending early parts of his career slowly developing.
